description:
FLIP2PDF is a simple command line utility that you can use to convert files to PDF documents.

You can use FLIP2PDf to turn Postscript files, graphic images, and Microsoft Office files into PDF files. The process also supports earlier versions of Microsoft Office as well as the more recent Office Open XML format:
• PostScript and EncapsulatedPostscript
• Word document, doc, docx
• Excel spreadsheets, xls and xlsx
• PowerPOint documents, ppt and pptx
• TIFF,JPG,BMP, and PNG graphic files

params.label: Input file
params.info: Enter the file name or file path of the documents to convert into PDF format

params.label: Output file/directory
params.info: Select or create the output file; selecting an existing file will overwrite it. If you want to create a new file, go to the directory you want, and type in the name you want to give the file (including the extension).

params.label: File Name
params.info: Enter the file path or file name of the JSON file used for Flip2PDF's settings.
